@minako-chan No, it was Aerith who never had a chance. The novels reveal she had already gotten over her feelings for Zack (she was young, by the time of the game she saw him as too immature for relationship). She did fall in love with Cloud, but since Cloud's memories were repressed and didn't come out until much later, she had no way to know that the true Cloud's motivation for even trying to join SOLDIER (for example) was too impress Tifa, because he was in love with her. Its just that the fake persona he created didn't remember that.
Always love to come back to this Master Piece. No Rape or Random fck Tards, Just Plain Tifa And Cloud.
